duties_responsibilities.duty: Use camera system to monitor and count the number of people entering and exiting the store.
Enter data into Salesforce daily to ensure accurate tracking.
Review and analyze customer traﬃc data in relation to sales data and identify trends and patterns to help optimize store performance.
Collaborate with store management to identify potential issues or areas for improvement.
Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of foot traﬃc data to support research and decision-making.
Continuously monitoring the performance of the foot traﬃc counter system and making recommendations for improvements.
Collaborating with other departments or agencies to provide video footage and information as needed.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required; associate or bachelor's degree in a related ﬁeld preferred.
